text: after you launch your game you will face
countless uncertainties will your
audience love your game and become your
loyal supporters or will they shower it
with one stars and mean reviews in the
world of AWS you have access to a
comprehensive suite of analytic
solutions to the everyday challenges for
keeping your players delighted and
coming back for more use Amazon EMR to
track player performance and they Stata
inform decisions to optimize your game
with connectors available for Amazon s3
Kinesis dynamodb and more use your
favorite tool of choice in the Hadoop
ecosystem to process data when you need
to gather real-time insights into your
kingdom use Amazon Kinesis to deliver
continuous game and player insight data
you can look into what games your
players are playing right now what items
they are purchasing from your store or
how many times they keep dying at the
hands of the same boss
use Amazon redshift to use familiar
sequel like tools to gain deeper
understanding of how players are
engaging your games leveraging massive
amounts of data for the fraction of the
cost of a traditional data warehouse to
analyze player data stored in Amazon s3
to use Amazon Athena simply point to
your data in Amazon s3 define the schema
and start query and using standard
sequel most results are delivered within
seconds
finally create visualizations and rich
dashboards with Amazon quick sites to
see the results of your quest and
quickly get business insight from your
data this was just a short preview of
the world of AWS and we have so much
more to show you make sure to visit the
AWS gaming website to check out the full
list of weapons that can help you with
your quest as a game developer many of
the popular games run on AWS start your
quest with AWS today
[Music]
